product_description: Want to remove staples without tearing your documents?If you work in an office where you constantly have to remove staples, then you're well aware of how challenging of a task it actually is. Tug too hard and you can tear or crease important paperwork. Prying them gently by hand is too time-consuming.But there's no need to go through the hassle of damaging documents or making a mess while removing staples. With the right tool, you can easily lift staples without ruining our papers!Effortlessly and neatly remove staple wires with the BOSTITCH Staples Remover!Featuring a push-style mechanism, our tool can easily lift staples from your documents without tearing them. Simply slide the stainless steel tongue under the staple wire and push. Doing so will quickly and efficiently remove any staple while leaving your paperwork's corners unharmed.No one wants sharp staple wires scattered on the desk or floor. Our tool comes with a staple grabber designed to keep wires at the end of the wand for easier cleanup and disposal. If ever staples do break loose, our accessory also has a magnetic tip that traps and keeps them from falling.Our durable tool makes easy work of even stacks of paper that need to be unstapled. Thanks, to its ergonomically designed rubber handle, you can hold and control the stick comfortably. Use it for hours without straining your hands.Here are more reasons you'll love this staple puller:Each pack has 3 red staple removersAlso functions as a convenient box openerMade with safe and durable materialsFunctional gift for colleagues and friendsRemove staple wires with ease. Add the BOSTITCH Staples Remover to your cart TODAY!
